summary:
Management:
	30+ years chemistry team management & leadership (2 to 8 collaborators, PhD, PostDoc, engineer, technician)
	Business management (activity or organisation evolution)
	Recruitment, objectives setting, collaborator development

Expertise:
	Oncology, Diabetes, CNS
	Organic Synthesis and semi-synthesis of natural products, medicinal & parallel chemistry
	Protein chemistry, Drug Targetting
	Biotherapeutics, Antibody-Drug conjugates
	Immuno-oncology

Innovation:
	Outstanding track record of inventive involvement in 7 New Chemical Entities entering clinical assays
	Co-inventor of  Cabazitaxel (Jevtana®) approved for metastatic prostate cancer
	Author & co-author of 14 papers and 57 patents

Projects:
	Project Manager in  kinase inhibitors programs ; demonstrated ability of managing multi-disciplinary project teams and large groups of medicinal chemists
	Project Team Member in multiple medicinal & biotherapeutics ; team player, responsive & cooperative

currentPositions.description:
	Development of new cytotoxics towards mature payloads platforms, new conjugation technologies and new formats for immunoconjugate (ADC) anticancer biotherapeutics.
	Development of new technologies for Targeted Drug delivery via imunoconjugates (CNS, Diabetes, Oncology / Immuno-Oncology) applied to small molecules, cytotoxic drugs, peptides, enzymes or oligonucleotides delivery.
	Immunoconjugates / ADC project member ; contribution to ADC discovery and development projects leading to 2 immunoconjugates entering clinical phases in 2014/2015. Most advanced ADC project, SAR408701 (anti-CEA-CAM5 ADC) currently in phase III clinical trial in non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC)
	Initiation and follow-up of new internal and external collaborations.
currentPositions.title: Group Leader in Chemical Biology, Sanofi R&D

educations.schoolName: Chimie ParisTech - École Nationale Supérieure de Chimie de Paris
Centre de Recherches Médecine Aérospatiale - Paris 15e
Université Pierre et Marie Curie (Paris VI)

educations.degree: Post Doctoral Stay ; Supervisor S. Hanessian

headline: Group Leader in Chemical Biology group - Sanofi

message.text: Je recommande et soutiens Alexandra sans réserve. Très grandes qualités scientifiques et humaines

Bonjour à tous - Je suis à la recherche d’un nouveau poste et j’apprécierais votre soutien. Merci d’avance pour toutes les mises en relation, tous les conseils ou les opportunités que vous pouvez offrir. #OpenToWork

commentary.text: Bravo Indréalie ! 👏 amplement mérité ; l'aventure continue 🤞
